text: David A. Capp (born January 18, 1950) is an American attorney who served as the United States Attorney for the Northern District of Indiana from 2007 to 2017. ==See also== *2017 dismissal of U.S. attorneys ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:United States Attorneys for the Northern District of Indiana Category:Indiana Democrats Category:Assistant United States Attorneys Category:University of Wisconsin- Madison alumni Category:Valparaiso University School of Law alumni Category:Indiana lawyers
title: David A. Capp
